Created an attachment (id=15592)
Preferences

I can only reproduce the exception from comment 0 in a fresh workspace like
this:
- import the attached preferences
- create new project
- set compiler and jre of project (not workspace) to 5.0

Bug 77655 is for the stacktrace of comment 1 (first part of the stack trace)

Have to investigate the BadLocationException. Markus, I understand right that it
only shows up under special circumstances.

Martin: I don't know how "special" the circumstances have to be. I ran into it
in my normal development workspace, but not in a fresh workspace. The steps are
just what I found to be enough to reproduce it from scratch. Maybe it's a common
setting that causes it.
